languages.text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.
languages.original_text: При каждом воздействии {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону Стратегического плана все союзники в ней получают +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. При повторном срабатывании эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a stratagem, all allies in that area gain +1 MP next turn bonus. Stacks with itself.
Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a stratagem, all allies in that area gain +1 MP bonus for the following turn. Stacks with itself.

Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

languages.text: При каждом воздействии {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону Стратегического плана все союзники в ней получают +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. При повторном срабатывании эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

traits.locale_text: При каждом воздействии стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана все союзники в ней получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 ОП на следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. При повторном срабатывании эффект суммируется.

При каждом воздействии стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана все союзники в ней получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 ОП на следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. При повторном срабатывании эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当战斗策略区域受到{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}效果影响时，该区域内所有盟友在接下来的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。此效果可多次叠加。
languages.original_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

traits.locale_text: 每当战斗策略区域受到{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}效果影响时，该区域内所有盟友在接下来的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。此效果可多次叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate se vea afectada por una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g}, todos los aliados presentes en esa zona ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} siguiente. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate se vea afectada por una estratagema, todos los aliados presentes en esa zona ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} siguiente. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategem{/g} beeinflusst wird, erhalten alle dortigen Verbündeten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für den folgenden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Stacked mit sich selbst.
languages.original_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet von einem Strategem beeinflusst wird, erlangen alle dortigen Verbündeten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} -{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} für die folgende {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}. Stapelt mit sich selbst.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} est appliqué à une zone de Tactiques de combat, tous les alliés présents dans cette zone bénéficient d'un bonus de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable avec lui-même.
languages.original_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un Stratagème est appliqué à une zone de Tactiques de Combat, tous les alliés présents dans cette zone bénéficient d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cumulable avec lui-même.

languages.text: 軍略エリアが{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}の効果を受けるたびに、そのエリア内のすべての味方は続く{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に+1{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を得る。それ自体と累積する。
languages.original_text: Every time a Combat Tactics area is affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}, all allies in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the following {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks with itself.

traits.locale_text: 軍略エリアが計略の効果を受けるたびに、そのエリア内のすべての味方は続く{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。それ自体と累積する。
